comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: Rare picture of the only USA acquired B.A.T. FK.23 Bantam (c/n.21). Formerly assigned F1660 in England. Acquired by the US Army Air Service as AS 94111. The machine got McCook Field number P-167. Probably there are in the archives reports of the tests performed at McCook field. There is a typo error in the official name, it is not Bantum but Bantam.
